argument.name: targetLength
argument.description: The desired length of the string.

argument.name: paddingString
argument.description: The string to use as padding for adding characters to the string when the string is shorter then the target length. A space is used by default.

page.description: Extension to the native string variable to support padding both sides of a string equally - a combination of the native String.padStart and String.padEnd methods. By default the separators are white-space and punctuation characters.
